short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be warned of epileptic shows before you watch!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flashguard is a community-driven project that helps people who suffer from photosensitive epilepsy by providing them with information regarding movies that are possibly epileptic, which contain flashes or strobing lights that may cause discomfort or seizures. Users can now make an informed decision on what movies they can watch.

This project won 2nd Place in Melbourne Hack 2021!
Consider supporting us at: https://ko-fi.com/diskordlit

View our DevPost and GitHub to learn more!
https://devpost.com/software/flashguard
https://github.com/Diskordlit/FlashGuard
